channel.title: 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program
channel.description:
Yes, the title explains my problem. I got my server to work but when I open my client it says that ^ What do I change? This is what the client run looks like. The server is 317 and my JDK version is 1.6.0_25 Low detail
@ECHO OFF title Client color 0f java -Xmx1000m client highmem pause
High Detail
@echo off COLOR 09 title Client @echo Client @echo ----------------------- java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause
[b]PROBLEM SOLVED! Lock please.[/b]
